channel.title: Npc handler is "bodged"
channel.description:
all day ive been trying to fix/add different things thats why youve seen alot of my posts...my java knowledge is crap but i still know how to fix simple stuff like adding shops and stuff ..when i try tochange an npc stat..say they hit lower/higher you have to go into npchandler if i am correct? but this is all i get in thier :S

item.title: Npc handler is "bodged"
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

you should have a folder called src and one called bin, bin is for compiled class files, src is for java files.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc handler is "bodged"
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:4, topic:366684”][quote author=stickywicky link=topic=462886.msg3386045#msg3386045 date=1288467106]
how to compile to java?
surely you dont use winrar?

[/quote]

No, you don’t compile class file to java files, it’s the other way around. You need to decompile, download one @

http://www.sureshotsoftware.com/cavaj/index.html[/quote]
that decompiler when i click download…says error file not found…so im gunan try find a diff 1

Read full topic

item.title: Npc handler is "bodged"
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:3, topic:366684”]how to compile to java?
surely you dont use winrar?[/quote]

No, you don’t compile class file to java files, it’s the other way around. You need to decompile, download one @

http://www.sureshotsoftware.com/cavaj/index.html

item.title: Npc handler is "bodged"
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

That’s npchandler.class which is compiled .java file (byte code). You need to edit .java files.

Read full topic
